title: Is my TalkBand B2 waterproof and dustproof? Can I wear it while swimming or diving?
answer:
Your TalkBand B2 is IP57 water and dust resistant, making it suitable for everyday use. Your TalkBand B2 can be used in the rain and when washing your hands, but make sure you wipe it dry after it comes into contact with water. It is strongly recommended that you do not wear your TalkBand B2 while washing your car, swimming, diving or showering.

If your TalkBand B2 is dirty, wipe it using a piece of wet cloth.
